name: Imposing Blade
text: Any time you kill an enemy during your turn, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the rest of the round.

name: Focusing Ray
text: During your Heal action, double the value of the Heal.

name: Volatile Elixir
text: During your ranged attack, add +2 %game.action.attack% and gain Advantage on the entire Attack action, but suffer 2 damage for each attack made.

name: Silent Stiletto
text: Any time you perform a melee attack, add %game.condition.pierce% 1 to the Attack.

name: Stone Charm
text: During your action where an obstacle is created, create one additional obstacle and apply all effects of the action to it.

name: Psychic Knife
text: Any time you perform an %Augment% action, add +1 %game.action.attack% to the entire action.

name: Sun Shield
text: When damaged by an attack, you may %game.element.consume.light% to gain %game.action.shield% 3 for the attack.

name: Utility Belt
text: During your turn, you or any one ally may Refresh %game.card.refresh% one of your spent or consumed items.

name: Phasing Idol
text: When a summon you own is damaged by an attack, it suffers no damage instead.

name: Smoke Elixir
text: During your turn, gain %game.condition.invisible% and create dark.

name: Pendant of the Plague
text: During your turn, %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.curse% one enemy within %game.action.range:3%.

name: Mask of Death
text: Any time you perform a melee attack and you have exactly 1 hit point, add +2 %game.action.attack% to the Attack.

name: Master's Lute
text: After performing any %song% action, immediately perform an %game.action.attack% 2 or %game.action.move% 2 action.

name: Cloak of the Hunter
text: Any time you perform a %Doom% action, %game.condition.muddle% the target of the %Doom%.

name: Doctor's Coat
text: Any time an ally performs a Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack action, they add +1 %game.action.heal% to their Heal.

name: Elemental Boots
text: If you move 5 or more hexes on your turn, create any element.

name: Staff of Command
text: After performing a %Command% action, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the same side of the card (top or bottom) as the %Command% action.

name: Sword of the Sands
text: During your melee attack, add %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.wound% to the entire action.

name: Basin of Prophecy
text: When you reveal cards from any deck, reveal one additional card.

name: Claw Trap
text: At the end of your turn, create one 4 damage %game.condition.poison% trap in an adjacent empty hex.

name: Moonleather Boots
text: Add +1 %game.action.move% to all your movement while you are at full health.

name: Spirit Libation
text: During your turn remove one damage token from one %Spirit% {cs-spirit-caller-token}. This %Spirit% may immediately take a turn without receiving a damage token.

name: Robe of Soothing
text: Whenever you given an ally a %Prayer% ability card, that ally may perform "%game.action.heal% 2, Self".

name: Chain Cannon
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 2, Self toward one enemy within %game.action.range:3%".

name: Nature Armlets
text: While %Mounted% on a summon, you can aply your %game.items.slots.small% items item effects to the summon instead.

name: Test Tube
text: During your turn, %game.element.consume.wild% to peforme one of the following: %game.action.move% 2, %game.action.jump%, %game.element.air% | %game.action.heal% 3, Self, %game.element.light% | %game.action.attack% 2, %game.element.fire%.

name: Luminous Carapace
text: During your turn, when you %game.element.consume.wild% an element, do not move the consumed element to the Inert column.

name: Flaming Armor
text: When attacked, you may %game.element.consume.fire% to gain %game.action.retaliate% 3 for the attack.

name: Field Mortar
text: Once each turn, during your turn, you may remove one condition from an adjacent figure and place that condition on this card if it is not already on this card. During your turn, one adjacent figure gains all conditions on this card, then consume %game.card.lost% this item.

name: Clamp Trap
text: At the end of your turn create one 3 damage %game.condition.immobilize% trap in an adjacent empty hex.

name: Cleansed Voidheart
text: You are immune to %game.condition.muddle%. At the end of each round, if you have %game.condition.wound% gain REGENERATE $regenerate$.

name: Steelsilk Spinneret
text: The next two times an enemy suffers damage from attacking you, that enemy gains %game.condition.immobilize%.

name: Auscudec of the Makers
text: During your turn, forgo your top action to play a summon action from a card in your lost pile, ignoring two ^scrapx^.

name: Rite of Ruin
text: During your attack ability gain %game.condition.wound% to add +3 %game.action.attack% to one attack. If you kill the target perform "%game.action.heal% 3, Self".

name: Wanderer's Club
text: Duing your attack ability, move one character token on one of your peristent abilities backward one slot and add +X %game.action.attack% to one attack, where X is the nuber of active peristent abilities.

name: Recalibration Trigger
text: During our turn, perform one of the two following abilities: Lose one card from your hand to gain 3 ^fh-hourglass^. ~@-2 ^fh-hourglass^ : %game.card.recover% up to two of your discarded cards@~

name: Spear of Justice
text: During your turn perform: %game.action.attack% 2 ~!%game.action.range:3%!~. All your banners are treated as additionally occupying the hex of the attack target of their bonuses and that hex is treated as occupied by an ally this round. ^eot^

name: Soul Urn
text: Place one ^fh-shadow^ in an adjacent hex. @wfh-dark@

name: Black Earth Codex
text: On the next three deaths of any of your summons,

name: Mask of Duality
text: During your ranged attack ability while in ^fh-geminate-right^, gain advantage for one attack, then flip this card over.

name: Ancestral Blade
text: During your turn, activate all your ^fh-astral^ as if you just performed a ^fh-astral^ action.

name: Mountain's Heart
text: During your turn, you may create either one 1-hex obstacle or hazardous terrain tile in an empty tile within %game.action.range:2%.

name: Sonorous Shard
text: Gain 3 ^fh-shards^

name: Sly Camouflage
text: When you create a trap, place a character token on it.  Monsters do not treat the trap as negative. Remvoe the token when you %game.card.recover% this item. ^ongoing^

name: Skull of Agony
text: When you suffer damage, if your hit point value is reduced to below half your maximum, perform: %game.action.heal% 7 ~!self, $wfh-curse$!~ This heal is not affect by and cannot remove negative conditions.

name: Storm Carving
text: During an attack ability you grant an ally, add $wfh-push$ 2 to one of their attacks, then flip this card over.

name: Freezing Orb
text: During your attack ability, add $wfh-brittle$ to one attack and create one 1-hex icy terrain tile in the featureless hex occupied by the target.

name: Energized Module
text: Remove all damage and negative conditions from one of your summons, then ^fh-prism^ to that summon.

name: Exhaust Boots
text: During your move ability, when you have ^fh-meter-yellow^ or ^fh-meter-red^, add +1 %game.action.move%, then flip this card over at the end of your turn.

name: Warlord's Skull
text: Whenever you gain $wfh-invisible$ or peform a teleport ability while you have $wfh-invisible$, after the ability perform: $wfh-muddle$ ~!%game.action.range:1%!~

name: Spiraled Medallion
text: When you rest, you may keep up to three ^fh-anemone^ cards in your active area.

name: Thrice-Souled Warsword
text: During your Attack ability, add +1 %game.action.attack% to one attack. Whenever this item is refreshed, one adjacent enemy suffers 1 damage.

name: Rekindled Core
text: During your melee Attack abilit, gain CHILL $chill$ to add CHILL $chill$ to the attack. After the attack flip, this card.

name: Crystal Catalyst
text: During your turn, play one level 5 or lower card from your hand or discard pile and immediately perform a %Crystalize% ^Crystalize^ action from that card.

name: Arclight Cladding
text: Whenever you DODGE $dodge$ an attack, you may spend this item instead of discarding a card from your hand.

name: Barbed Whip
text: During your turn, perform "%game.action.pull% 1, %game.condition.muddle%, %game.action.range:3%".
